mapper.select: select SQL_CALC_FOUND_ROWS p.*, w.id w_id, w.descrim w_descrim, w.name w_name, w.nick w_nick, w.birth w_birth, w.gender w_gender from T_reply p LEFT OUTER JOIN T_party w ON p.writer_id = w.id where p.bb_id = #{boardId} and w.descrim = 'user' order by p.id desc limit #{paging.limit} offset #{paging.offset};

select r.*, w.id w_id, w.descrim w_descrim, w.name w_name, w.nick w_nick, w.birth w_birth, w.gender w_gender from T_reply r LEFT OUTER JOIN T_party w ON r.writer_id = w.id where r.id like CONCAT(#{id}, '%') and w.descrim = 'user';
mapper.update: update T_reply set upt_dt = upt_dt, read_cnt = read_cnt + 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
select NEXT_PK('s_reply')
INSERT INTO T_reply(id, descrim, writer_id, TITLE, content, bb_id, movie_id, genre, age_limit) VALUES (#{id}, 'post', #{writer.id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{boardVO.id}, #{movieVO.id}, #{genre}, #{ageLimit});
INSERT INTO T_reply(id, descrim, writer_id, content, star_score) VALUES (#{reply.id}, 'reply', #{reply.writerId}, #{reply.content}, #{reply.starScore});
mapper.update: update T_reply set star_score = ( select round(avg(star_score),2) from T_reply where id like CONCAT(#{id}, '%') and descrim = 'reply' ) where id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from T_reply where id like CONCAT(#{id}, '%');
